participant_1.background:
I have a large cd collection.
I collect stamps.
I play the bass.
I like vintage furniture.

participant_2.background:
I was born in kansas.
I work on a farm.
I know how to drive a truck.
I love chickens.
I eat eggs for breakfast.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to work on the farm, drive my truck, and hang out with my chickens.
Cool! I like to play bass, collect stamps, and read books.
I've never played an instrument, but I love listening to music. I also like to collect things, but I collect vintage furniture instead of stamps.
That's cool! I love vintage furniture too. I have a lot of old chairs and tables that I've collected over the years.
That's awesome! I love finding unique pieces of furniture. I have a really old dresser that I found at a garage sale.
That sounds great! I love finding unique pieces too. I have a really old bookcase that I found at a thrift store.
That's awesome! I love thrift stores. I always find great deals there.
Me too! I love finding vintage clothes and furniture.
I love finding vintage clothes too! I have a lot of old dresses and skirts that I wear all the time.
That sounds great! I love dressing up in vintage clothes.
Me too! It's so much fun to look like a different person.
I agree! It's like being someone else for a day.
Me too! It's so much fun.
